metadata.title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if the int datatype is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the int datatype and all of its valid operations.

modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

notes.note: The "bitwise and" and "bitwise or" operations are currently not supported and will generate an error value for this test definition. Therefore, they should be commented out when running this test definition.

criteria.comment: True if the equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the equals operation with a single equal integer.
Check of the equals operation with a single unequal integer.

criteria.comment: True if the not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the not equal operation with a single equal integer.
Check of the not equal operation with a single unequal integer.

criteria.comment: True if the greater than operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the greater than operation with a single greater than integer.
Check of the greater than operation with a single equal integer.
Check of the greater than operation with a single less than integer.

criteria.comment: True if the greater than or equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single greater than integer.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single equal integer.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single less than integer.

criteria.comment: True if the less than operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the less than operation with a single less than integer.
Check of the less than operation with a single equal integer.
Check of the less than operation with a single greater than integer.

criteria.comment: True if the less than or equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the less than or equal operation with a single less than integer.
Check of the less than or equal operation with a single equal integer.
Check of the less than or equal operation with a single greater than integer.

criteria.comment: True if the bitwise and operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the bitwise and operation with a single integer where the result is the same as the state mask.
Check of the bitwise and operation with a single integer where the result is not the same as the state mask.

criteria.comment: True if the bitwise or operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the bitwise or operation with a single integer where the result is the same as the state mask.
Check of the bitwise or operation with a single integer where the result is not the same as the state mask.
